Set a custom change address for transaction outputs.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}

>

  parameters={undefined}
>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"Request parameters for the set_change_address endpoint","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","description":"Set the change address for transactions","required":["fingerprint"],"properties":{"change_address":{"type":["string","null"],"description":"Change address (null to use default derivation)","example":"xch1..."},"fingerprint":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","description":"Wallet fingerprint","example":1234567890,"minimum":0}},"title":"SetChangeAddress"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
